thread.title: Aladdin musical to premiere in the West End in June 2016 - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Aladdin musical to premiere in the West End in June 2016 - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Sam Warner
title: Aladdin musical to premiere in the West End in June 2016 - Showbiz
text: The West End production of the musical Aladdin, based on the 1992 Disney film, will premiere on June 9, 2016.The show, which opened on Broadway last year, will play at the Prince Edward Theatre in London, with previews from May 27. © Disney / Deen Van Meer Although the full cast has yet to be announced, it has been confirmed that Trevor Dion Nicholas will play the Genie, made famous by the late Robin Williams in the Disney film.It follows a poor young man who comes across a lamp containing a genie, using wishes to marry Princess Jasmine.The play has had a successful run on Broadway after transferring from Toronto and Seattle. © Disney / Deen Van MeerAdam Jacobs in the Aladdin musical. Aladdin features songs from the original film, as well as new songs by Alan Menken, and lyrics by Tim Rice, Howard Ashman and Chad Beguelin, the latter having also written the book.It will be directed and choreographed by The Book of Mormon's Casey Nicholaw.Tickets go on sale to the public from November 23, with priority booking from October 23. © Disney / Deen Van MeerCourtney Reed and Adam Jacobs in the Aladdin music Meanwhile, the original Aladdin stars Brad Kane (Aladdin) and Lea Salonga (Princess Jasmine) recently reunited to sing 'A Whole New World' on Good Morning America.It was to mark the release of Aladdin: Diamond Edition for Blu-ray on October 13, which also features unseen footage of Robin Williams.
